display_long_description:
Warzone Forge puts you right in the middle of an intense VR battlefield where creativity meets combat.

Construct your defense zone, upgrade weapons, and summon units to fight waves of enemy forces. With motion-based controls, every move you make has a real impact — aim, shoot, and build like a true commander.

🛠️ Build & Strategize: Place structures and defenses to protect your base.
🔫 Fight in Real Time: Use powerful guns and VR mechanics to take down enemies.
⚙️ Upgrade & Customize: Unlock new weapons and tools to strengthen your strategy.
🧠 Plan or React: Every battle requires quick thinking — one wrong move and your defense collapses!
🎯 Designed for VR: Smooth controls, intuitive aiming, and satisfying physics.

Whether you’re forging your path through enemy waves or testing creative defenses, Warzone Forge delivers an addictive mix of action, strategy, and immersive VR fun.

Get ready to build, defend, and conquer — the forge awaits.
